text: On the Reeperbahn at Half Past Midnight () is a 1969 West German drama film directed by Rolf Olsen and Al Adamson and starring Curd Jürgens, Heinz Reincke, and Jutta D'Arcy. It takes its title from a popular 1912 song of the same name about Hamburg, the setting of the film. It is also known by the alternative title Shock Treatment. The film is a remake of On the Reeperbahn at Half Past Midnight (1954). ==Main cast== == References == == Bibliography == * == External links == * Category:1969 films Category:1969 crime drama films Category:German crime drama films Category:West German films Category:German-language films Category:Films directed by Rolf Olsen Category:Films set in Hamburg Category:German film remakes Category:1969 drama films
title: On the Reeperbahn at Half Past Midnight (1969 film)
